question: Which Ashokan inscription mentions five contemporary Hellenic Kings?
explanation: The Major Rock Edict XIII of Ashokan inscription mentions Asokaâ€™s victory over Kalinga and names of Greek Kings such as Antiochus, Ptolemy, Antigonus, Magas and southern Indian rulers such as Cholas, Pandyas. It has also mentioned names of Kamboj, Nabhaks, Bhoja, Andhra, etc.
